name: Count the Cars
description:
Looking for a little boring clicker game? Look no further!

Presenting you with "Count the Cars", a basic clicker game where you have to count the cars... But clicking on them.

How far did you get?

OK, about the development behind this. I saw the froggie kit on craftpix.net and have been wanting to do something with it for a while, and then the clicker jam poped up and I was "oh I have a few hours".

It was fun to waste abit of time developing this, and I would have love to make more advancements on this little game.

Few things, i'd add? More cars, background animations, sounds, music, more conditions....

In actual fact, I was wasting 2 days just trying to come up with an idea, that required more than just "clicking".... Obviously I failed... None the less... Here we all...

All in all? In a few days I will look back on this, and think "a few hours well wasted..." lol :P
